field.name: LoginBannerText
field.default: Welcome to the CAMIANT Manager. Please enter your user name and password below to access the manager desktop. If you do not have an existing user name or password, or if you have misplaced either, please contact the CAMIANT system administrator.|$|Welcome to the CAMIANT MSR. Please enter your user name and password below to access the MSR desktop. If you do not have an existing user name or password, or if you have misplaced either, please contact the CAMIANT system administrator.

class.name: NetworkElement
class.annot: Network Elements represent the nodes that make up the network.

class.name: Path
class.annot: Path is a route through the network, and is identified by source and destination networkelements

class.name: Account
class.annot: An Account represents a billable entity that contains individual users.

class.name: Tier
class.annot: Tier is a class of service or a logical grouping of subscriber accounts.

class.name: SgwMapping
class.annot: SgwMapping is a class of Serving Gateway IP Address and MCC-MNC mapping.
